caption:
Good news this holiday season 🎉🍷 You can still enjoy a drink while staying gut-friendly on the low fermentation diet.

The Microbiome Connection recommends: 
🍸 White wine over red wine 
🍺 Lagers or low-hop beers over IPAs 
🍹 Mixed drinks without sweetened mixers (skip the excess sugar and HFCS!) 

Cheers to gut health and happy holidays! 🥂✨

#LowFermentationDiet #GutFriendlyTips #HolidayCheers #MicrobiomeConnection #GutHealth #HolidayDrink #IBS #SIBO
